name: Chartered Institute of Trade Mark Attorneys
goal:
CITMA represents the interests of over 1600 trade mark and design professionals, and fights to bring recognition to the work they do.

We also feed their enthusiasm for the profession through regular conferences and events, professional development courses, newsletters, social media debate and the CITMA Review.

Our community of members includes fully qualified trade mark attorneys, those in training and support roles, and barristers and solicitors with a trade mark or design interest working around the world.

CITMA has legal responsibility for regulating the profession.

Our three strategic objectives are:

◦To be the pre-eminent body for Trade Marks and Designs in the UK
◦To represent, promote and engage the membership and the wider profession
◦To equip and support our membership to be competitive and successful
interests: Business and Industry, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Intellectual Property, mainly in the area of trade marks and designs

Brexit
